snippet: David E. Sanger, chief Washington correspondent, and Marcus Mabry, Rendezvous’ editor, discuss North Korea’s nuclear strike warnings and whether a new round of sanctions, written by China and the United States, can work.
abstract: David E. Sanger, chief Washington correspondent, and Marcus Mabry, Rendezvous’ editor, discuss North Korea’s nuclear strike warnings and whether a new round of sanctions, written by China and the United States, can work.

headline.main: China and the U.S. Join Forces on North Korea
